nodes.text: The father of Corso Riggs was a male Human living on Ord Mantell during the Cold War. He was the father of Corso Riggs, whom he taught about responsibility with weapons. During the Separatist War on Ord Mantell he and his wife were killed by the Separatist forces.
Corso Riggs's father is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Corso Riggs companion mission.
